titlestmt.subtitle: An inventory of David Kiefer at DC Public Library
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Derek Gray.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-03-26 13:36:57 -0400.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The collection consists of multiple bound copies of Tech Life, the newspaper of McKinley High School and copies of newspapers from other Washington, D.C. schools. They are not a complete run.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: David Kiefer, an avid theatre buff, donated his personal collection of Washington, DC theatre programs and other materials.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of newsletters, programs, publications and other materials related to Washington, DC theatres.

did.unittitle: Arena Stage (On Stage at Arena Stage)
Kennedy Center for Performing Arts (Opera House)
